reviewText:
a paranoiac vision of the future, from the montypython animator and director of twelve monkeys.
the misadventures of sam lowry struggling to correct a clerical error with possibly fatal consequences whilst getting swamped in a sea of beurocratic fascist lunacy.
satirical and scary
sureal and exciting.
sorted.
great twist at the end, one of the best sci fi films ever.
on a par with blade runner.
